(Maximals fail? Never gonna happen... again:P Alright, how about: DIE 
ALLIANCE DIE!^_^ Peace 'n Joy everybody, Merry christmas, Happy Chaunaka, 
um, Good Rahmadan(?) and Happy Kwanza! Hmm, I get the distinct impression 
the Alliance wants me dead:P

Tavatron/Hysteria/Rion

Hysteria dove to the right, barely avoiding the brunt of Obliteratron's 
attacks. She felt the sir rush by her as they struck the ground where she 
had been standing only moments ago. She raised her arms and simultaneously 
fired two missles from each arm/shoulder cannon at Obliteratron's head. (She 
has four, one on each shoulder and one on each arm.) Hysteria opened the 
compartment under her arm, grabbed a charge, compressed the sides, and 
tossed it at the back of Obliteratron's left leg. It stuck on impact, and 
was set to explode 3 seconds later with a force highly unexpected of a 
regular charge.

*****

Tavatron flew about five yards from the force of Dark Wolf's orb. Her right 
optic was sparking, but other than that she seemd fine. Luckily the orb had 
only grazed her. She fired her optics at Dark Wolf's chest, and managed to 
barely dodge Scatterchot's fire. She performed a rather poor backflip, and 
landed with a snoutfull of dust from the rounds. Tavatron held her staff in 
front of her and charged the energon blades. The last time she tried this 
the staff had exploded. Well, it was worth a shot. She sent a sickle shaped 
energy blast at Scattershot's torso:

"Pathetic, slag-sucking Alliance 'bot!"
(no offense:P)

(The energy blasts are about 1 ft long, and pure energon blasts. So it's 
kinda unstable^_^)

Rion:

Rion backed away a bit as Diana advanced on him. She had that look on her 
face. That look she always got when she was about to...

"No! Don't! Aaahhh--Hahahahehee!"

Rion broke donw in a fit of laughter. She was Diana alright! Only one 'bot 
in the world knew just how tickelish he was!

"Dia-- haha-- na!"

Rion could barely speak through his fits of laughter. But he was definitely 
glad to see her! He'd tell her, if only he could speak!
